MoveWindowBetweenScreens.desc: Moves windows between screens and handles full-screen mode correctly.

moveWindowToScreen.desc: Moves a window to the specified screen (next or previous) and handles full-screen mode.

params.name: screenFn
params.desc: Function to determine the target screen (e.g., screen:next or screen:previous).

centerMouseInWindow.desc: Moves the mouse to the center of the specified window.

params.name: win
params.desc: The window to center the mouse in.

moveWindowToNextDisplay.desc: Moves the currently focused window to the next display.

moveWindowToPreviousDisplay.desc: Moves the currently focused window to the previous display.
